compatibility.notes: The SugarCRM-1.1.3 license allows for integration with other licenses under certain conditions, particularly when using weak copyleft licenses. Care should be taken to ensure compliance with the terms of the licenses involved.

key_requirements: Provide attribution to the original authors.
Include the original license text in all copies or substantial portions of the software.
Disclose modifications made to the original code.
license.name: SugarCRM-1.1.3
obligations: Must disclose source code when distributing modifications.
Must include a copy of the license with any distribution.
Must include copyright notices in all copies or substantial portions of the software.
Must state changes made to the original code.
